verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H2063><s%> are the beasts <S%H2416><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> among all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are on <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> parteth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is cloven-footed, <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> and cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> among the beasts, <S%H929><s%> that shall ye eat. <S%H398><s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of them that chew <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> or of them that divide <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6536><s%> the hoof: <S%H6541><s%> as <S%H853><s%> the camel, <S%H1581><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divideth <S%H6536><s%> not <S%H369><s%> the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And the coney, <S%H8227><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divideth <S%H6536><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And the hare, <S%H768><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> but divideth <S%H6536><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the hoof; <S%H6541><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And the swine, <S%H2386><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> divide <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and be cloven-footed, <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> yet he <S%H1931><s%> cheweth <S%H1641><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the cud; <S%H1625><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

Of their flesh <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> eat, <S%H398><s%> and their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> touch; <S%H5060><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you.

<S%H853><s%> These <S%H2088><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are in the waters: <S%H4325><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> hath fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and in the rivers, <S%H5158><s%> them shall ye eat. <S%H398><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H369><s%> fins <S%H5579><s%> and scales <S%H7193><s%> in the seas, <S%H3220><s%> and in the rivers, <S%H5158><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that move <S%H8318><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and of any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> thing <S%H5315><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you:

They shall be <S%H1961><s%> even an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you; ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> of their flesh, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> but ye shall have their carcasses in abomination. <S%H8262><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5038><s%>
Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> hath no <S%H369><s%> fins <S%H5579><s%> nor scales <S%H7193><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you.

And these <S%H428><s%> are they which ye shall have in abomination <S%H8262><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> the fowls; <S%H5775><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be eaten, <S%H398><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are an abomination: <S%H8263><s%> <S%H853><s%> the eagle, <S%H5404><s%> and the ossifrage, <S%H6538><s%> and the osprey, <S%H5822><s%>
And the vulture, <S%H1676><s%> and the kite <S%H344><s%> after his kind; <S%H4327><s%>
<S%H853><s%> Every <S%H3605><s%> raven <S%H6158><s%> after his kind; <S%H4327><s%>
And the owl, <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the night hawk, <S%H8464><s%> and the cuckoo, <S%H7828><s%> and the hawk <S%H5322><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
And the little owl, <S%H3563><s%> and the cormorant, <S%H7994><s%> and the great owl, <S%H3244><s%>
And the swan, <S%H8580><s%> and the pelican, <S%H6893><s%> and the gier-eagle, <S%H7360><s%>
And the stork, <S%H2624><s%> the heron <S%H601><s%> after her kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the lapwing, <S%H1744><s%> and the bat. <S%H5847><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> fowls <S%H5775><s%> that creep, <S%H8318><s%> going <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all four, <S%H702><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you.

Yet <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> may ye eat <S%H398><s%> of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> flying <S%H5775><s%> creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all four, <S%H702><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have legs <S%H3767><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> to leap <S%H5425><s%> withal <S%H2004><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them ye may eat; <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the locust <S%H697><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the bald locust <S%H5556><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the beetle <S%H2728><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and the grasshopper <S%H2284><s%> after his kind. <S%H4327><s%>
But all <S%H3605><s%> other flying <S%H5775><s%> creeping things, <S%H8318><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have four <S%H702><s%> feet, <S%H7272><s%> shall be an abomination <S%H8263><s%> unto you.

And for these <S%H428><s%> ye shall be unclean: <S%H2930><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And whosoever <S%H3605><s%> beareth <S%H5375><s%> aught of the carcass <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

The carcasses of every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> divideth <S%H6536><s%> the hoof, <S%H6541><s%> and is not <S%H369><s%> cloven-footed, <S%H8156><s%> <S%H8157><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> cheweth <S%H5927><s%> the cud, <S%H1625><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you: every one <S%H3605><s%> that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> them shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his paws, <S%H3709><s%> among all manner <S%H3605><s%> of beasts <S%H2416><s%> that go <S%H1980><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> all four, <S%H702><s%> those <S%H1992><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you: whoso <S%H3605><s%> toucheth <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And he that beareth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of them shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even: <S%H6153><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

These <S%H2088><s%> also shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you among the creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> the weasel, <S%H2467><s%> and the mouse, <S%H5909><s%> and the tortoise <S%H6632><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%>
And the ferret, <S%H604><s%> and the chameleon, <S%H3581><s%> and the lizard, <S%H3911><s%> and the snail, <S%H2546><s%> and the mole. <S%H8580><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are unclean <S%H2931><s%> to you among all <S%H3605><s%> that creep: <S%H8318><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> doth touch <S%H5060><s%> them, when they be dead, <S%H4194><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And upon <S%H5921><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> any of <S%H4480><s%> them, when they are dead, <S%H4194><s%> doth fall, <S%H5307><s%> it shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> whether it be any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> or <S%H176><s%> raiment, <S%H899><s%> or <S%H176><s%> skin, <S%H5785><s%> or <S%H176><s%> sack, <S%H8242><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> it be, wherein <S%H834><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> is done, <S%H6213><s%> it must be put <S%H935><s%> into water, <S%H4325><s%> and it shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even; <S%H6153><s%> so it shall be cleansed. <S%H2891><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> earthen <S%H2789><s%> vessel, <S%H3627><s%> whereinto <S%H834><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H8432><s%> any of <S%H4480><s%> them falleth, <S%H5307><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H8432><s%> it shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> and ye shall break <S%H7665><s%> it.

Of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> meat <S%H400><s%> which <S%H834><s%> may be eaten, <S%H398><s%> that on <S%H5921><s%> which <S%H834><s%> such water <S%H4325><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> shall be unclean: <S%H2930><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> drink <S%H4945><s%> that <S%H834><s%> may be drunk <S%H8354><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> such vessel <S%H3627><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> thing whereupon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> any part of their carcass <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5038><s%> falleth <S%H5307><s%> shall be unclean; <S%H2930><s%> whether it be oven, <S%H8574><s%> or ranges for pots, <S%H3600><s%> they shall be broken down: <S%H5422><s%> for they <S%H1992><s%> are unclean, <S%H2931><s%> and shall be <S%H1961><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> a fountain <S%H4599><s%> or pit, <S%H953><s%> wherein there is plenty <S%H4723><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> clean: <S%H2889><s%> but that which toucheth <S%H5060><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And if <S%H3588><s%> any part of <S%H4480><s%> their carcass <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> sowing <S%H2221><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is to be sown, <S%H2232><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall be clean. <S%H2889><s%>

But if <S%H3588><s%> any water <S%H4325><s%> be put <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the seed, <S%H2233><s%> and any part of their carcass <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5038><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> unto you.

And if <S%H3588><s%> any beast, <S%H929><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye may eat, <S%H402><s%> die; <S%H4191><s%> he that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> thereof shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And he that eateth <S%H398><s%> of the carcass <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even: <S%H6153><s%> he also that beareth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of it shall wash <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and be unclean <S%H2930><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the even. <S%H6153><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be an abomination; <S%H8263><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be eaten. <S%H398><s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the belly, <S%H1512><s%> and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> goeth <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all four, <S%H702><s%> or whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> hath more <S%H7235><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> creeping things <S%H8318><s%> that creep <S%H8317><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> them ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat; <S%H398><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are an abomination. <S%H8263><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H408><s%> make yourselves abominable <S%H8262><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth, <S%H8317><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye make yourselves unclean <S%H2930><s%> with them, that ye should be defiled <S%H2930><s%> thereby.

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> ye shall therefore sanctify yourselves, <S%H6942><s%> and ye shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy; <S%H6918><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am holy: <S%H6918><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> with any manner <S%H3605><s%> of creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that bringeth you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> ye shall therefore be <S%H1961><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am holy. <S%H6918><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> of the beasts, <S%H929><s%> and of the fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%> in the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

To make a difference <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean, <S%H2889><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> the beast <S%H2416><s%> that may be eaten <S%H398><s%> and the beast <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H834><s%> may not <S%H3808><s%> be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
